text:
Artículo de Rebecca Solnit: “Trans women do not pose a threat to cis-gender women, and feminism is a subcategory of human rights advocacy, which means, sorry, you can’t be a feminist if you’re not for everyone’s human rights, notably other women’s rights.”
https://t.co/aLajmbz79W

diputado.grupo: Grupo Parlamentario Confederal de Unidas Podemos-En Comú Podem-Galicia en Común
